## Description {#details}

Abstract concept of an analysis pass.

This concept is parameterized over the IR unit that it can run over and produce an analysis result.

Definition at line 271 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanagerinternal-h">PassManagerInternal.h</a>.
